node.hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
node.detail_zh: 患者僱主為第 #52 宗確診個案，僱主曾參與長康邨康美樓相關患者於 1 月 26 日在北角明星海鮮酒家的聚餐，但患者本人無參與該聚餐。2 月 9 日患者曾到香港大會堂外的露天地方，與十多名朋友聚會約 1 小時，當時各人有戴口罩，無聚餐。 第 52 宗個案於 2 月 13 日確診當日，獲安排入院檢查。 患者 2 月14 日凌晨入院，對新型冠狀病毒快速測試呈陰性，但肺部 X 光有陰影，2 月 15 日獲安排接受電腦掃描，發現肺部「有問題」，2 月 17 日重新化驗，於 2 月 18 日確診。
node.detail_en: This patient is an employee of patient no. 52. Her employer attended a gathering with relatives/friends residing in Hong Mei House of Cheung Hong Estate (some of whom were subsequently diagnosed with coronavirus) on Jan 26 where this patient was absent. On Feb 9, this patient had a gathering with more than ten friends outside Hong Kong City Hall for around an hour, during which all of them wore masks and did not have meals together. After patient no. 52 was diagnosed with coronavirus on Feb 13, this patient was admitted to a hospital the following day and tested negative for coronavirus. However, because her chest X-Ray film showed shades in the lungs, she underwent a CT scan which revealed abnormalities. She was then re-tested for coronavirus on Feb 17 and diagnosed on Feb 18.
node.classification_zh: 可能本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 有居於 A07 室住戶先後確診，懷疑病毒經損毀的排污渠管系統傳播。衞生署一度撤離大廈 A07 室住戶接受隔離。食環署消毒涉及單位及房署檢查單位喉管後，居民獲安排返回居所。
groups.description_en: Some residents of the flats A07 across various floors of Hong Mei House (C H Estate, Tsing Yi) were diagnosed, hence leading to to suspicion of sewer leakage. Over a hundred residents of flats A07 were transferred to quarantine centre(s?). Residents were allowed to return home after FEHD sterilized the flats in question and confirmed that the sewer system is intact.

node.location_zh: 康柏徑 10 號康景花園 D 座
node.location_en: Block D, Mount Parker Lodge, 10 Hong Pak Path
node.remarks_zh: 患者為第 52 宗患者的家庭傭工；2 月 2 日開始咳及發燒
node.remarks_en: The patient is the domestic helper of patient No. 52; fever and cough since Feb 2

node.remarks_zh: 患者在大會堂外與十多名朋友坐了約一個小時，當時所有人有戴上口罩
node.remarks_en: The patient met with 10 other friends while wearing face masks outside the City Hall for about an hour.
